Package net.heroicefforts.viable.android.rep

Interface Summary
IssueResource This interface represents well-defined states of issues in the issue repository.
Repository This is the main service interface implemented by bridges to the various issue tracking systems.
 

Class Summary
NullIssueResource A text-only IssueResource implementation used for unknown resource types.
RepositoryFactory A factory class for generating repositories associated with Viable client application.
TypePriorityStateResource An issue resource based upon type, priority, and state.
 

Exception Summary
CreateException This exception is thrown if there is an error creating a repository.
ServiceException Thrown if there is an issue connecting to the service or the service throws an unexpected error.
